<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 146 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 325 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn belt

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A feeling of security radiates out from this sash made of fine yellow fabric. You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68).

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You and each ally in a 5-foot emanation reduce your [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) values by 1.
